Experiencia laboral.Descripción: Support and assistance with day-to-day tasks for a 14-year-old migrant girl. The girl faced language, cultural adaptation, and social integration difficulties.
Supervision and assistance with academic tasks for two groups of students aged 11 to 14. Most students had learning and/or behavior difficulties.
Leisure time monitor for children aged 6, 7, and 8.
Administration of cognitive tests, development of the Individualized Care Plan (ICP), emotional support, and application of cognitive stimulation exercises.
Leisure time monitor for children aged 6, 7, and 8.

Psychological care for adults with mental health diagnoses. Participation in a Job Placement Team and in a Day Hospital at the Maresme Therapeutic Community, under the supervision of clinical psychologists in both cases. Currently collaborating with the Individualized Support Plan team.
Monitor and educator for a 7-year-old child with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD).

Experiencia laboral.Puesto: Volunteer at the Spanish Association Against Cancer (AECC)
Experiencia laboral.Descripción: Accompaniment of oncological patients at the Clinic Hospital of Barcelona.

Datos académicos.Título: Master's Degree in General Health Psychology

Datos académicos.Descripción: Participation in a study on weight-based discrimination, eating disorders, and psychological well-being in adolescents led by David Sánchez Carracedo and funded by the Government of Spain.

Perfil personal:
I am a young woman with great abilities to interact with people. I have mostly worked with children and young people, but I have also been in contact with the elderly and adults with mental disorders.
I enjoy working in teams and have listening and speaking skills. Helping people is my passion.
